edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.openSSL

Class OpenSSLTripleDES

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.openSSL.OpenSSLPRP
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.openSSL.OpenSSLTripleDES
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrfFixed, PrpFixed, PseudorandomFunction, PseudorandomPermutation, TripleDES

    public class OpenSSLTripleDES
extends OpenSSLPRP
implements TripleDES
    Concrete class of PRF family for Triple DES. This class wraps the implementation of OpenSSL library.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenSSLTripleDES()
      Default constructor that creates the TripleDES objects.
      OpenSSLTripleDES(java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Constructor that creates the TripleDES objects and lets the user choose the source of randomness to use.
      OpenSSLTripleDES(java.lang.String randNumGenAlg)
      Constructor that creates the TripleDES objects and lets the user choose the random algorithm to use.
